summary: Brothers Grass and Cobra Snake feel unable to build up a life to be satisfied with. Grass, unemployed and still without a girl, does not know how to escape from the shadow of his druggie and troublemaker brother Cobra.
cast: Matej Hádek|Krystof Hádek|Jan Hájek|Lucie Zácková|David Máj|Lucie Polisenská|Vera Kubánková|Jana Sulcová|Jan Vápeník|Martin Bonhard|Thomas Zielinski|Pavel Tesar|Ivana Lokajová|Adrian Gabaj|Tobias Rimsky|Ondrej Nosálek|Jiri Cermak|Pavel Dusak|Veronika Reháková
title: Kobry a uzovky
